snippet: A $3 million building will rise on the footprint of the old Islamic Cultural Center, in the Morrisania section of the Bronx, which burned down in 2009.
abstract: Large $3 million Islamic center will rise in the Morrisania section of the Bronx, on the footprint of the Islamic Cultural Center, which burned down in 2009; new center will bring together a growing population of Muslims from West African countries who have settled in the borough.
lead_paragraph: A $3 million building will rise on the footprint of the old Islamic Cultural Center, in the Morrisania section of the Bronx, which burned down in 2009.

headline.seo: Islamic Cultural Center in Bronx Rebuilds
headline.main: Rebuilding a Space for Prayer and Culture
headline.print_headline: Muslim Space for Prayer to Rise Again After 2009 Fire
